name: LiveSplit
notes: Hotkeys are not discovered when LiveSplit is not in focus.

task.description: Installing .NET 4.5. This will take a while...
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- livesplitzip: https://github.com/LiveSplit/LiveSplit/releases/download/1.7.6/LiveSplit_1.7.6.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: LiveSplit.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet45
    arch: win32
    description: Installing .NET 4.5. This will take a while...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win10
    arch: win32
    description: Changing to 10 version...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    file: livesplitzip
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/LiveSplit.exe
